posts.post_content:
From landboysteve: "Without trample of some kind of evasion this card is so-so in limited and virtually unplayable in constructed. What a waste of paper."  
  
Almost every creature would be *better* with evasion or trample. That doesn't mean it's a waste of paper for not having it. Quit being lazy: Just give it evasion or trample if you think it needs it! [Whispersilk Cloak](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Whispersilk Cloak) gives it evasion and protection, as does [Akroma's Memorial](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Akroma's Memorial), and the memorial, [Loxodon Warhammer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Loxodon Warhammer), [O-Naginata](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=O-Naginata), and [Sword of Vengeance](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sword of Vengeance) all provide trample and are just awesome anyway. None of the ones I mentioned have any color requirements, so they fit in any deck the juggernaut does. All of them are artifacts, so they make the juggernaut bigger.
posts.html:
From landboysteve: "Without trample of some kind of evasion this card is so-so in limited and virtually unplayable in constructed. What a waste of paper."

Almost every creature would be better with evasion or trample. That doesn't mean it's a waste of paper for not having it. Quit being lazy: Just give it evasion or trample if you think it needs it! Whispersilk Cloak gives it evasion and protection, as does Akroma's Memorial, and the memorial, Loxodon Warhammer, O-Naginata, and Sword of Vengeance all provide trample and are just awesome anyway. None of the ones I mentioned have any color requirements, so they fit in any deck the juggernaut does. All of them are artifacts, so they make the juggernaut bigger.

Posted By: Concerned_Bystander (6/14/2011 10:53:38 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Best flavor text of any card ever.  
Insane in any deck with a good chunk of artifacts. Ungodly in a Myr deck. Then it just gets scarier when you give him a [Sword of Vengeance](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name= Sword of Vengeance), or even a [O-Naginata](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=O-Naginata). Then you've really got an unstoppable object. An immovable force.  
Simply the best.  
And strictly better than [Doom Blade](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Doom Blade).
posts.html:

Simply the best.
And strictly better than Doom Blade.
